name: vue-pywebview-pyinstaller
description: 基于pywebview和PyInstaller框架，构建macOS和windows平台的客户端。本应用的视图层支持Vue、React、Angular、HTML中的任意一种，业务层采用本地Python+调用远程API。
author: 潘高 <pangao1990@qq.com>

scripts.init:macos: npm install --prefix ./gui && python3 pyapp/spec/getSpec.py --mac && python3 -m venv pyenv && ./pyenv/bin/pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r ./pyapp/assets/requirements.txt
scripts.init:windows: npm install --prefix .\gui && python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && python -m venv pyenv\pyenv && .\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r .\pyapp\assets\requirements.txt && python -m venv pyenv\pyenvCEF && .\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r .\pyapp\assets\requirements.txt && .\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple cefpython3
scripts.pre: shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && run-script-os
scripts.pre:cef: shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && .\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-pre-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-pre-cef .\buildCEF\windows-pre-cef
scripts.pre:folder: shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && .\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-pre.spec
scripts.pre:folder:cef: shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && .\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-pre-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-folder-pre-cef .\buildCEF\windows-folder-pre-cef
scripts.build: shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && run-script-os
scripts.build:cef: shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && .\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-cef .\buildCEF\windows-cef
scripts.build:folder: shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && .\pyenv\pyenv\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder.spec
scripts.build:folder:cef: shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && .\pyenv\pyenvCEF\Scripts\pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-folder-cef .\buildCEF\windows-folder-cef
